input.sentences: the little baby enjoyed the chocolate frosting .
the boy was putting sprinkles on the cupcakes .
he poured a number on one particular cupcake .
for his birthday he got hotwheels cars .
output.sentences: Emily enjoyed licking the choclate frosting off her fingers.
The kids enjoyed putting the sprinkles on the cupcakes almost as much as eating them.
Emily's sister was happy to help out at the birthday party.
She concentrated really hard being careful not spill as she poured the cupcake batter.
Besides cake, hotwheels cars were gifted and all the kids had a good time at the birthday party.
